content: This contribution hasnâ€™t received enough positive votes from the community. The "FASTEST" option has therefore been deactivated.

"Rounded to the nearest 0" is very confusing imo.
I would suggest you edit the statement to say "...give the integer part of the angle of refraction (in degrees" instead

âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: I accept this contribution because it was a solid contribution in the first place with an interesting topic, and now several small changes have been made to make it acceptable, in my opinion.

I want to accept this because I enjoy Physics problems. I do have some notes though.

- In output, you say "rounded to nearest 0" when I think you mean cast to nearest integer.

- You wrote "Exemple" instead of Example in your test case.

- I think it might be nice to have the formulas outside of the paragraphs. I think it looks a bit dense at the moment. (This is just me being finicky)

- To keep Clash of Code times low, I might recommend adding a note about radian and degree conversions possibly being necessary.
